website_summaries.verdict: Hands down the best available — you won't find a more complete set with better quality on the market today.
pros: Features cups and spoons with sleek design
comes with a convenient conversion chart
Sports an attractive brushed finish and solid construction
cons: Other than the higher price, there are few concerns with this set

customer_reviews.title: I love that these have the thicker handles
customer_reviews.text: I love that these have the thicker handles! The whole cup (and spoon) feels very sturdy and doesn't bend at all! I also love the fact that all numbers are actually engraved and so they don't wash off in the dishwasher. These cups are actually quite good-looking, and I like the extra measurements inside each cup. Overall, these are a must-have. They are a FULL set, including 2/3 and 3/4 cup, and even 1/8 tsp and 1/2 tbsp measures! So handy and so well made!
customer_reviews.author: MrsBadGuy

customer_reviews.title: stainless steel is loud
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it until I got both these, but stainless steel is loud. I can live with the noise though. These are great - the text won't rub off, they're metal so I don't need to be worried about putting anything hot in or on them, and they are sturdy. I also love the pour spouts and the intermediate tick marks on the cups. I do wish they gave more/different intermediate tick marks, but that's just cuz I'm lazy and a messy cook so if I could I'd like the option to not wash the measuring cup with the exact measurement I need, if I can re-use the larger cup that I'm already using.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a few measuring cups and spoons over the past few years. I hate plastic they can stain and seems like they never get clean, the metal ones I have bought seem to either have the paint flake off or they rust in my dishwasher so when I saw these I thought I would give them a chance and I was very surprised how heavy they are. Very good quality and well printed. I have a feeling this will be the last set I buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy D

customer_reviews.title: Great measuring cup/spoon set
customer_reviews.text: Both the spoons and cups work great. The cups also have extra indents on the outside/inside that allow you to use the same cup for multiple measurements (ex.the 1 cup having a 1/2 cup marking on it). Both the spoons and cups come with D-rings, but I pwrsonally don't use the ring for the cups. The chart it comes with is okay. The writing on it was printed at a slight angle and it will definitely rub off at some point (not indented in the metal like the spoons and cups, just printed ink). I did not deduct a star for that because I only really wanted the spoons and cups anyway.
customer_reviews.author: ElegantFrost

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: These are the same quality of the $27 ones were theyre just the measuring cups. Not only do these come with teaspoons and the measuring cups they come with a magnet! I still wanted the 1/8 cup really bad. And luckily they sold that individually with the other brand. So this way I spent $27 and got teaspoons cups and 1/8 cup. All great quality would do it again. The magnet is not cheap, made out of the stainless steel material too
customer_reviews.author: IMDAYFAM

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give a 5 star review. They're very well crafted, solid measuring cups. My problem is that mine didn't come with a 1/4 cup. I can't find a way to contact the seller to get one either. So I'll have to return them and buy a different set since these are currently out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, well made and well designed at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: These spoons and measuring cups arrived so promptly and looked just as they are pictured and described. They are new for me and I haven't used most of them yet. They do look and feel sturdy and I am pretty sure they are durable. I really like the convenient additional markings within the cups! Definitely handy and efficient. And they stack together so well. So glad I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: the placard is very nice and easier than whipping out your phone for a ...
customer_reviews.text: the placard is very nice and easier than whipping out your phone for a quick conversion. the scoops are all great quality and sturdy, and they fit nicely inside one another. I don't know why measuring cups/spoons are always sold with a little ball bearing chain. I think that's the stupidiest way to keep them organized. but they do their job well and I think they'll last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: niko

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for home use
customer_reviews.text: The cups and spoons are well finished with no raw edges. The spoons are thicker than the cups and heavy duty. The cups are thinner but not prone to break; a medium thickness that I believe suits home use but not commercial use. I've had mine for 6 months with no fading of engraving or snapping of handles. The engraving is clear and deep. The cups are one unit (no welding) which I prefer. They are good quality and I would recommend them for a home user. I can see them lasting a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Wanja Muriu

customer_reviews.title: What she wanted and more!
customer_reviews.text: Browsing through a wedding registry and bought the complete measuring set. I love the added bonus of the conversion chart. I have a refrigerator magnet (looks like a liquid measuring cup!) with all the conversions. I've had it for what seems forever and, yes, I use it regularly! Cooking for two requires halving recipes! Hope that my newlywed niece gets as much use with hers as I have with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality. I don't think I'll ever need to get another set.
customer_reviews.text: Good weight. Wife loves the aide with the multiple measurement labels on the spoons and cups. Simplifies her resizing of recipes. This would be an upgrade for anybody that enjoys working/playing in the kitchen. Thinking about another set for gift giving.
customer_reviews.author: PZlo

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: This is my first stainless steel measuring cup set and I think this will be last one.very sturdy and nicely built..even the smallest measuring spoon stays upright without spilling out the liquid inside it.definitely would recommend. And regarding the rust. Have to see after a few months of use.looks like it will last a very long time
customer_reviews.author: Shwetha

customer_reviews.title: The Best Measuring Cups and Spoons Ever!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is beyond compare. I truly have found the most comprehensive collection of measuring devices. I love to cook and need to be able to have accurate measurements for the diversity of food products I use on a daily basis. This is it. Quality superb! Ordering easy, delivery fast and I bought two sets so I can travel with one set in our camper. Very satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela D Tate

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I had plastic ones previously and the handle broke off while trying to scoop flower from my jar. I love these one piece metal cups because they are very durable and strong. The best thing about this metal product is that it's one whole piece so there's nothing to break off.
customer_reviews.author: NC2448

customer_reviews.title: Quality and ease of using.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Christmas gift and I will tell you now she is going to absolutely love it!! I love all the different sized measurements. I'm actually shipping it early with a couple of other gifts and going to tell her this one she can open now. I want her to have it for her holiday baking and cooking. Thank you for such a high quality product material wise and ease of using!! ☺🎈🎉🎄
customer_reviews.author: Grace Ann Eckstorm

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product and costmer service
customer_reviews.text: I would just like to say that this company is just plain wonderful. I love the product sturdy, well-built and easy to clean. I want to comment on the company as doing a wonderful job, I received my order very quickly but when I got it I had two 1/4 tsp measuring spoons. I contacted the company and they resolved the situation within three days even over the weekend. All I can say is Great costumer service and an out standing product.
customer_reviews.author: tjjcsnwp

customer_reviews.title: Easylife Measuring Cups and Spoons Set of 15
customer_reviews.text: Super heavy duty and I love these measuring cups because I wont need to replace them any time soon. Each cup has a little pour spout, so you can use for liquids as well as dry ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: ksummerfield

customer_reviews.title: Good tools
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace old plastic measuring cups and spoons. Over the years, it became impossible to clean them properly and they looked dirty. These are sturdy and look easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Louise108

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like these measuring cups were really designed with the baker in mind. From the inner measurement lines to the side pouring design, these have been a joy and an ease to bake with. I'm so glad that I purchased these!
customer_reviews.author: CompositeKid

customer_reviews.title: Measuring Cups that measure.
customer_reviews.text: Measuring cups that measure things. The edges are a bit sharp and are unpleasant to handle. I'll get over it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Fritts

customer_reviews.title: Best measuring cups
customer_reviews.text: These cups are everything they said they were. They feel great in the hand, especially with the small detail of the indentation for your finger or thumb to the ability to pour liquids easily. They are strong, solid, and sturdy. If they truly don’t rust over time, they are definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice set! It's very well made and for me ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set! It's very well made and for me the best part is having the measurements both in Metric and Imperial System. I love the metal magnet chart as well, super convenient and looks neat on the fridge. The numbers are engraved in the metal, so they'll never fade. I hope it really does last a lifetime. For the fair price and quality, I really recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this set of measuring cups
customer_reviews.text: Love this set of measuring cups! Love that the measuring numbers are engraved so they can't wash off (like plastic ones do). I think it's genius they added a conversion chart! Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cronk

customer_reviews.title: The metal is great
customer_reviews.text: I always hated plastic measuring cups. The metal ones are great. These are sturdy and easy to clean. Plus they look good so I have them hanging up in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the spoons and LIKE the cups
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over amazon for a reasonably priced set of measuring cups and spoons. I LOVE the spoons and LIKE the cups. The spoons seem like high quality steel and have a nice feel in the hand. The cups seem sturdy but the handles don't feel as nice when you hold them. They definitely serve the purpose and all the measures that you would frequently use are included. Overall it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Sneha P

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for fair price
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the metal may be flimsy & thin, but these are solid, great quality cups. They are surprisingly heavy (in a good way), & give you the impression of a high-end restaurant cooking utensil. I would definitely recommend. One of the better purchases I have had recently through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Smith

customer_reviews.title: Conversion Chart!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little steel set of measuring cups/spoons. The conversion chart it comes with is super useful and the main reason I bought this. The chart is magnetic and we have it on our fridge. We've also consolidated out the random measuring stuff we have and have them in a junk drawer. These are the only set we use regularly.
customer_reviews.author: sgbolt

customer_reviews.title: Measuring cups
customer_reviews.text: I really like these stainless measuring cups and spoons. The plastic ones become scratched over time and that shouldn't happen with these. I also like the way they all nest together. Takes up less room in the drawer. Dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey53

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone!!
customer_reviews.text: I've worked in kitchens before and one of the most annoying things is not being able to read measuring spoons and cups. These look great and the numbers are very well displayed. Great quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rupple

customer_reviews.title: Great set of measuring cups that I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love these measuring cups. They are all one piece stainless steel so no broken handles. They stack beautifully in the drawer because of the streamlined handles. They are very sturdy and solid. They are also have easy to grip handles with an indentation for your thumb and a small helper handle on the other side if needed. For me they are perfect and are everything I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cups
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for replacement measuring cups as the ones I had, the measurements came off of the cups. This is perfect because the measurements are etched on the handle. They are very nice quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking set!
customer_reviews.text: These measuring cups and spoons are very sturdy and seem like they'll last. I like how nicely they stack together so they don't take up a lot of room in the drawer. The 2/3 and 3/4 cup measurements are hard to find and are the main reason I bought this set over others.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nesbit

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.  Just buy it if you want a good set!
customer_reviews.text: I went through several different sets of measuring cups and spoons. I learned that engraved numbering is a must. This set is fantastic. You can tell this set will last many decades.
customer_reviews.author: tlarson6

customer_reviews.title: Great for measuring...
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better than those crappy plastic ones that we have gone through so much in our lives. I like that the cups have a pouring divot in the cup and they also include some other measurements on them inside the cups so you can use one cup for more than one thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great product made by 1easylifem it even come with measurement ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product made by 1easylifem it even come with measurement chart. I just got in to baking not long ago. Those different size measurement tool are so useful. Now my cookie baking process is so much easier and faster.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Gu

customer_reviews.title: Like them
customer_reviews.text: Due to all the cooking during COVID-19 I had to buy a back up pair of measuring utensils. These are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karisha

customer_reviews.title: Great, compact measuring cups and spoons
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy and compact measuring set. Dishwasher safe and easy to read. Throw out the plastic measuring sets—you won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Ranu

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, easy to clean, and does not get stained. The bigger measuring cups have a little point to help pour it out.
customer_reviews.author: HS Mundi

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I love the range in sizes and the overall design. Very clean and modern looking. Great that they’re dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Tori B

customer_reviews.title: Ok. Not as heavy duty as I had expected
customer_reviews.text: Good buy. But was not as heavy duty and thick as I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Get some of these!
customer_reviews.text: Really liking this new set ... been looking for quality stainless measuring cups and spoons for a while, but most are incomplete (i.e. too few cups and spoons). I was concerned at first about the length the cup handles, but after using them I like them better than the long (and thinner) handles on an old set. Both the spoons and the cups stack well ... don't even used the rings that came with them :)
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Amazing spoons. The ring makes it easy to not dirty all the spoons if you're like me and don't take each individual spoon off when you use it. Haven't used the cups yet, but if they are half as good as the spoons then they will be great.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: nice, cups - stamped from one piece of metal ...
customer_reviews.text: nice , cups - stamped from one piece of metal flat and heavy on bottom so they stand up when empty, spoons the same, no edges to have food particles get caught in that would require extra attention when cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: RANDY T.

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Was given as a gift and well received. These are sturdy little boogers!
customer_reviews.author: seywhut

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! Every size you could need and great quality! They are easy to hold and pour and have half sizes marked on the cups which I think is super neat. I would definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Noneya

customer_reviews.title: Love these. They are a good weight
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are a good weight, and all one piece, so they won't rust and come apart. awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Rhy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bakers - has measures not present in 4-cup sets
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for bakers - has a 3/4 cup measure that most sets do not have, and pour spouts on the sides of the cups. The spoons include an eighth tsp measure, and a half Tblspoon measure.
customer_reviews.author: bert

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Love the measuring cups. Wish numbers could be seen better in and out. But wouldn't let that stop anyone from buying again.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price of admission.
customer_reviews.text: Complete set (as opposed to only 5 cups with limited measurements), phenomenal quality, intuitive, and nice add with the magnetic conversion chart.
customer_reviews.author: SARDOG52

customer_reviews.title: Makes Baking Easier!
customer_reviews.text: It was time to discard all my old plastic measuring spoons and cups. These are sturdy and well made. I am pleased with them and use them often. The conversion chart was an extra added attraction and handy to use,
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Slim but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The cups replaced an OXO magnetic set that was bulky. This one is so slim that when the cups are stacked, they take up less space than just one of the OXO's did. I was also looking for the extra measurements for both cups and spoons. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Michaud

customer_reviews.title: High quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new measuring cups and spoons! I swear I searched up and down all over shops in my area and did not find a product like this. I have the measuring table, which is a magnet, on the side of my fridge for easy reference. Been using these daily for over a month now. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this set!! I cook and bake a lot and now am dieting which means a lot more eating at home. These are easy to use and easy to clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AZfox

customer_reviews.title: It’s looks good, but there’s a black dot that I cannot ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s looks good, but there’s a black dot that I cannot remove. I need this in a hurry, so I didn’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: got these for my mom for her to replace all her old stuff. she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Clevenger

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set - only 2 things I would change is that the 1/4 cup has a 1/6 mark on it and the secondary amount but I would rather have 1/8 and the spoons are a little hard to clean because of the kind of pointy shape. Love the conversion magnet!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Measuring spoons and cups disappear like socks around here
customer_reviews.text: Measuring spoons and cups disappear like socks around here. These are a nice set that aren't too thin/flimsy; the magnetic measurement cross reference is nice, but I find I use Alexa or my phone most of the time for conversions. A good set, nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: ShopVintageGifts

customer_reviews.title: Better than Google. Plus you can bake a cake.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. The measuring guide is an added bonus that Google can't compare to.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy. I love that each measure cup has also ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made, sturdy. I love that each measure cup has also markers inside indicating smaller increments as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rogério Naressi

customer_reviews.title: I am an awful person.....
customer_reviews.text: As awful as this sounds, I bought these as a wedding present and kept them for myself lol. They are great, high quality, and thick steel. I can't say that I have one negative comment.
customer_reviews.author: LSU Chick

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected- appear to be very high quality & ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected- appear to be very high quality & got rid of the cheaper plastic measuring utensils I have!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Chapman

customer_reviews.title: All one piece, high quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this measuring set. They are durable and easy to use. I love that they are all one piece so I don't have to worry about the handle breaking off which is what happened to my last set.
customer_reviews.author: lala_karren2

customer_reviews.title: these are the best measuring spoons & cups.
customer_reviews.text: I ought this set for my son who does alot of cooking & baking. He always borrowed mine & loved my set and how sturdy it was & the different amount like 2/3 or 3/4 & the measuring spoons he was very pleased with. I would recommend these to my friends & family. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Grisanti

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought these in the first place!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Wish I had bought them originally instead of all the cheap ones I’ve bothered with in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Shimkat

customer_reviews.title: Great item! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love how sturdy and fantastic looking these spoons and cups are! I love the conversion chart but wish that the writing was engraved rather than just printed, the one I received looked very faded so I have to be careful not to smudge it with fingerprints. Other than that these cups and spoons are great
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Cups & Spoons
customer_reviews.text: They are very well designed and of course who wouldn't love the Measurement conversion magnet!! :)

customer_reviews.title: The cups and spoons are a nice heavy weight and there are many increments of cups
customer_reviews.text: The cups and spoons are a nice heavy weight and there are many increments of cups. The extra measuring chart is a bonus I stuck on my fridge. Great product, recommend them.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these is A1. All the food I have cooked has increased by 100% in taste. I am not an iron chef.

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE these. Such great quality
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE these. Such great quality. I'm happy I finally ordered them. I wasn't planning on it because of the price but did and happy to say it was a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda F.

customer_reviews.title: Good product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I received my package without the measuring spoons included, but customer service was very responsive and quickly sent me a replacement without hassle. The quality of the product is good, looks like it will last, and an excellent alternative to plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Guest

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality. I like the way the measuring cups stack together without the ring...easier to use. A little spendy, but, I imagine over time they will be worth the cost.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, easy to clean, love the seamless design. The last set you'll ever have to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Linda K

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and perfect for gravys
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy duty. All of my.plastic ones would somehow stain, or morph into a weird shape, but these guys are stainless steel! I can't hurt them! I'm in love with them so much that I had to reorganize my baking cabinet so that they looked like the star! Would totally recommend and buy as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Hanzik

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: These are the sturdiest measuring cups and spoons I've ever found. Wish I'd found them years ago.
customer_reviews.author: DDoug1960

customer_reviews.title: Great Design
customer_reviews.text: I've had cheaper sets have the markings rub off. This set makes that impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Rainemaker

customer_reviews.title: easy to read and not going to rub off
customer_reviews.text: They are surprisingly heavy and very durable. the measurement markers are well done, easy to read and not going to rub off.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Mitchell

product_meta.title: 1Easylife Measuring Cups and Spoons Set of 15, Durable Single Stainless Steel 6 Measuring Cups and 6 Measuring Spoons with 2 D Rings and Magnetic Measurement Conversion Chart
feature_bullets: [ESSENTIAL 6 SPOONS & 6 CUPS with 2“D” RINGS and A BONUS MEASURE EQUIVALENT] - Complete set includes 6 stainless measuring cups (1/4, 1/3 , 1/2, 2/3, 3/4 and 1 cup) and 6 spoons (1/8, ¼, ½, 1 tsp, ½, 1 tbsp), 2 D rings and a bonus equivalents magnet is also contained, you can easily stick it on your fridge, and always have it on hand.

[PREMIUM HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL of 304 18/8 STAINLESS STEEL] - Food grade material of 304 stainless steel, satisfying feeling of solidity, features rust proof, corrosion proof, and chemical resistant. The last kitchen measuring set you need!

[NO MORE GUESSING] - LONGER and Easy-to-grip handles with clearly etched on markings feature neither worn off nor washed off over time, a more comfortable grip feeling makes easily measure dry and liquid ingredients.

[REFINED FINISH& PERFECT BALANCE] - Made of one piece polished well construction with smooth around, so there is no gaps for ingredients to get stuck, pretty hefty in the weight and flat bottoms on cups feature not prone to tipping over, makes both cleaning and measuring a breeze.

[NICE "D" CLIP and DISHWASHER SAFE] -Steel rings that hold them together that are easy to open/close to remove the spoon/cup you want, nesting-spoons/cups for easy storage and space-saving. You can also throw them wash in the dishwasher for quick and easy cleanup.
